description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is live, listing great deals various on electronics, like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, smart TVs, PCs, and laptops. The US-based e-commerce giant is also offering additional cashback, exchange bonuses, interest-free EMI options, and credit card discounts, too.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Refrigerators From Samsung, LG, Haier, Whirlpool and Other Brands

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 is live in India, offering discounts on a wide range of products. Gamers can find attractive deals on gaming peripherals such as monitors, controllers, and more at reduced prices. SBI debit and credit cardholders get an extra 10 percent instant discount, while EMI plans, coupons, and exchange offers provide further savings. While previous coverage focused on smartphones, laptops, and home appliances, this roundup highlights the best gaming accessory deals available during the ongoing sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Samsung, Logitech, Sony, EvoFox Gaming Peripherals

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is currently live in India. If you are planning to buy thin and light laptops, the platform is offering up to 45 percent discount on popular models from brands such as Lenovo, HP, Dell, and Asus. Buyers can avail exchange offers, Amazon Pay-based discounts on top of the deal price. Purchases made using SBI Cards can get additional discounts.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Thin and Light Laptops You Can’t Miss

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 offer different vacuum cleaners at jaw-dropping discounts. Brands like Eureka Forbes, Dreame, and Philips have listed top models with high suction power and advanced technologies in the ongoing sale. Buyers can avail bank offers, exchange discounts, Amazon Pay based offers and more during the sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Vacuum Cleaner Deals on Amazon Right Now

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is live across India, offering discounts on gadgets, home appliances, and laptops. Among the highlights are 2-in-1 laptops, which function as both PCs and tablets and are gaining popularity. These versatile devices are available with attractive offers during the sale. Shoppers can save more with a 10 percent instant discount for SBI cardholders, along with EMI plans, exchange deals, and coupons. This roundup spotlights the best 2-in-1 laptop deals in the ongoing sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Discounts on 2-in-1 Laptops From HP and Lenovo

description: Fold has teamed up with Stripe and Visa to launch a bitcoin-only rewards credit card. Cardholders will earn 2 percent back in bitcoin automatically on purchases, with the potential to rise to 3.5 percent through Fold Checking Account activities. Users can also earn up to 10 percent with select retail partners. Analysts note that bitcoin’s volatility means the value of rewards may fluctuate, making it a high-risk, high-reward option for users.
title: Fold Partners Stripe, Visa to Launch Bitcoin Rewards Credit Card

description: Google Play is set for a major revamp with new gaming-focused features, Google announced on Tuesday. The update adds tools to help players track stats and achievements across devices, alongside a dedicated “You” tab, gamer profiles, and Gemini Live integration. Google Play Games on PC has also exited beta and is now widely available.
title: Google Play Gets a Major Upgrade With Gamer Profiles, Rewards System and Gemini Live Guidance

description: GoPro Max 2 360 action camera was unveiled on Tuesday by the US-based tech firm, alongside the Lit Hero compact action camera and Fluid Pro AI gimbal, according to a press release. The new Max 2 supports 360-degree video recording at 8K resolution. The company claims that the camera is capable of capturing 21 percent more resolution than its competition. On the other hand, the Lit Hero can shoot 4K resolution videos at up to 60fps, as per the press release.
title: GoPro Max 2, GoPro Lit Hero With Up to 8K Video Recording Launched Alongside Fluid Pro AI Gimbal: Price, Specifications

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is now moving into the world of ice cream. The technology, which has already transformed multiple industries and workplaces, will soon be used to design new frozen dessert formulations and optimise products. On Monday, The Magnum Ice Cream Company (TMICC) announced a collaboration with an AI startup to explore these possibilities. The AI system will also help the company manage calories and reduce production costs.
title: Not Even Ice Cream Is Safe from AI: Magnum to Use AI Technology to Create New Products

description: Samsung has announced the One UI 8 release schedule for Galaxy devices in India. The Android 16-based operating system was introduced with the seventh-generation foldables in July, and was rolled out to the Galaxy S25 series in India last week. It will now arrive on more devices, including the Galaxy S24 series, Galaxy A-Series and M-Series devices, and Galaxy tablets, starting next month.
title: Samsung Announces Android 16-Based One UI 8 Upgrade Schedule for Galaxy Devices in India: Eligible Models

description: Google has introduced Mixboard in public beta for users in the US. This new experimental AI tool is designed to transform ideas into design and visuals. With Mixboard’s open canvas and generative AI capabilities, users can start a new project from a text prompt or choose from pre-populated boards. It allows users to add their images or use AI to leverage visuals.
title: Google Launches Mixboard AI Tool That Lets You Transform Ideas Into Creative Visual Boards

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL and Pixel 10 have topped DxOMark’s display rankings, outperforming the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, now in third place. DxOMark praised their well-balanced performance across all tests, highlighting standout features such as accurate colour reproduction, high peak brightness, responsive touch, and eye comfort enhancements, putting them ahead of Samsung's flagship smartphone for 2025.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Beat Other Flagship Handsets to Top DxOMark Ranking for Smartphone Displays

description: The Realme GT 8 Pro is set to be launched in China next month, comprising two models: the Realme GT 8 and the Realme GT 8 Pro. As per the company, the latter will be equipped with a 2K resolution flat display. Further, the upcoming handset is confirmed to get a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto sensor, as part of a triple rear camera setup.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Confirmed to Come With 2K Display, 200-Megapixel Periscope Camera

description: The crypto market entered a consolidation phase on Wednesday, with Bitcoin trading near $112,000 (roughly Rs. 99.3 lakh) and Ethereum hovering around $4,100 (roughly Rs. 3.6 lakh). Broader sentiment stayed cautious after recent liquidations worth $1.65 billion (roughly Rs. 14,600 crore) and dovish signals from the US Federal Reserve. Traders are now eyeing Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s next remarks and key inflation data later this week for fresh cues on market direction.
title: Bitcoin Trades Sideways as Crypto Traders Remain Cautious, Await Fresh Cues

description: The announcement of a strategic partnership between OpenAI and Nvidia on Monday quickly sparked discussion across Silicon Valley. The attention wasn’t centred on financial details but on what the collaboration could mean for the future of artificial intelligence (AI). Crucially, it suggests OpenAI is moving towards reducing its dependence on Microsoft. Here are five takeaways.
title: Friendship Over With Microsoft? Nvidia’s $100B Deal Reveals 5 Signals into OpenAI’s Future

description: Google has announced that it is now bringing a new artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled feature, which was earlier exclusively available with the Google Pixel 10 series in the US. The conversational editing functionality in Google Photos is now being rolled out to all eligible Android smartphones in the US. However, the California-based tech giant did not reveal when this feature will be released in India for the Google Pixel 10 series and other Android phones.
title: Google Photos Brings Conversational Photo Editing Feature From Pixel 10 to Other Android Phones

description: Motorola’s Moto G96 may look and feel familiar, but under the hood there are plenty of meaningful changes. Key among these is the efficient and seemingly capable processor from Qualcomm and the increased battery capacity. Together, these upgrades aim to improve its overall battery life while delivering better performance than its predecessor.
title: Moto G96 Review: A Do-It-All Budget Beast

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra could still debut with 60W wired fast charging, as per a tipster. In recent weeks, rumours have surfaced, which claimed that the purported handset will not carry any charging speed upgrades. These claims have been contradicted by tipster Ice Universe. Meanwhile, reports suggest that the handset is likely to house the same 5,000mAh battery as the Galaxy S25 Ultra.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Charging Specifications Tipped Again; May Offer 33 Percent Faster Charging

description: Sony has confirmed the next State of Play broadcast for September 24, where it will reveal gameplay for Saros, the upcoming roguelike bullet-hell shooter from Returnal developer, Housemarque. The State of Play show will be livestreamed on YouTube and Twitch and will be more than 35 minutes long.
title: Sony Announces State of Play Livestream for September 24, Will Reveal Saros Gameplay

description: DJI Osmo Nano was globally unveiled on Tuesday by the Chinese tech company. It is presently available in select markets, including Canada, the UK, and the EU. It is offered in a 64GB base storage variant and the higher-end 128GB storage option. The company stated that the new DJI Osmo provides “professional-level visuals” while retaining its compact form factor.
title: DJI Osmo Nano Launched With Up to 4K Video Recording, SuperNight Mode: Price, Features

description: Google has rolled out a “Mark as Read” feature for Gmail notifications on Android, letting users quickly mark emails as read without opening them. While it may have a limited impact for those who manage their inbox meticulously, it helps others track read and unread messages efficiently. Users can still open the full email if more details are needed. Additionally, Gmail on iOS now shows sender avatars, making it easier to identify important senders and prioritise messages at a glance.
title: Gmail Rolls Out Improved Notifications on Android, Displays Sender Avatars on iOS

description: Oppo Pad 5 was spotted on the Geekbench website ahead of its possible launch next month. The tablet is listed with model number Oppo OPD2506. The listing suggests MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, Android 16 operating system and 12GB RAM on the tablet. It got 2,673 points in single-core testing and 7,839 points in multi-core testing.
title: Oppo Pad 5 Listed on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC and Other Key Specifications

description: The iPhone 17 series was launched at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event on September 9, and the latest Pro models from the Cupertino-based tech giant have undergone a major redesign. A teardown video for the iPhone 17 Pro gives a glimpse of its internals, including the new vapour chamber, and rate its repairability. The loss of the dual-entry design and the use of multiple types of screws made the self-repair a bit tricky, although battery replacements could become easier than before.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Teardown Video Shows New Vapour Chamber, Explains Reason Behind 'Scratchgate'

description: WhatsApp has introduced a new feature called Message Translations. As the name suggests, it aims to facilitate communication between users around the world by translating messages in real time. It supports six languages on Android and more than 19 on iOS. As per WhatsApp, Message Translations feature works in individual chats, group conversations, as well channel updates.
title: WhatsApp’s New Message Translations Feature Can Translate Messages in More than 19 Languages

description: The HP OmniBook X Flip 14 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch 3K OLED display that offers punchy colours. It also features a powerful Intel Core Ultra 7 258V processor that can deliver top-notch performance and provide a decent battery life. The device also features a decent keyboard with short key travel and a large touchpad for a smooth typing and scrolling experience.
title: HP OmniBook X Flip 14 Review: Incredible Power Meets Insane Efficiency
